conversation.text: Man, I found this channel last night where all the uploads were just sponges getting cut in half with scissors. But the production quality was like, incredibly high. And there was this weird circus music over every video, but like, sped up so it sounded like nightcore.
Where do you even find this stuff?
I'm telling you, you gotta stay up past 3AM for the internet gods to smile upon you. They share no treasures with those weak to sleep.
